thread.section_title: Paramount Hotel Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing holiday
thread.title_full: Amazing holiday - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Craig C
title: Amazing holiday
text:
Returned a week ago from a wonderful holiday. Hotel lovely and reception very relaxing.
Found bedroom to be large enough, we had two very comfy double beds, a nice bathroom
With good shower. The room was spotless and found maids to be very friendly.
Good restaurant we ate there twice very reasonably priced and staff very helpful.
Only criticism is on hotel website it said there was a nightclub when my son asked about it he was told it was by invitation only (not very happy about this)
I would definitely return to this hotel again and recommend it
